metadata.description: Turn a new page in fear with Hill House Comics, new from DC! Masterminded by Joe Hill, the writer behind the hit TV series NOS4A2 and the comics sensation Locke & Key, Hill House Comics is a new horror pop-up from DC - and this sampler gives you a taste of what’s coming in spine-chilling titles like Basketful of Heads, The Dollhouse Family, The Low, Low Woods and more.
metadata.name: Basketful of Heads
